biotools.summary: Unified Nucleic Acid Folding. Simulate folding, hybridization, and melting pathways for one or two single-stranded nucleic acid sequences. Folding prediction for single-stranded RNA or DNA combines free energy minimization, partition function calculations and stochastic sampling. For melting simulations, entire melting profiles are computed , not just melting temperatures.
